org.deeplearning4j.arbiter.optimize.api.score

Interface ScoreFunction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseNetScoreFunction, EvaluationScoreFunction, RegressionScoreFunction, ROCScoreFunction, TestSetAccuracyScoreFunction, TestSetF1ScoreFunction, TestSetLossScoreFunction, TestSetRegressionScoreFunction

    public interface ScoreFunction
extends java.io.Serializable
    ScoreFunction defines the objective of hyperparameter optimization. Specifically, it is used to calculate a score for a given model, relative to the data set provided in the configuration.

      • minimize

        boolean minimize()
        Should this score function be minimized or maximized?
        Returns:
        true if score should be minimized, false if score should be maximized
